title: Nursing Collaboration Simulation: Project-Based Deep Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Group collaborative learning emphasized in digital simulation environments, promoting deep learning through metacognition

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative nursing interventions with 90% accuracy through role allocation in 3-person group projects based on standardized patient scenarios.
Learners can enhance reflective practice skills by applying metacognitive strategies over 80% in self/peer evaluation reports post-simulation.
Learners demonstrate collaborative competence by deriving consensus within 15 minutes using communication skills in group conflict situations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
